title: Ocean's variables study
questions: How to process extract ocean's variables?
objectives: Deals with ODV collection with data originating from Emodnet chemistry
Visualise ocean variables to study climate changes
key_points: Learn to extract data and visualize them on ODV
Learn to chain ODV and DIVAnd

workflows.name: Ocean's variables

workflows.description: Subset data on the Mediterreanean see and extract and visualise the Phosphate variable
